    E

    Elevator - Class in model
    Represents the game's elevator, managing its state, movement between floors, and position.
    Elevator(int, int) - Constructor for class model.Elevator
    Constructs an Elevator.
    ElevatorView - Class in view
    Renders the elevator scene, including the moving shaft background, the static cabin, and the player.
    ElevatorView(GameModel) - Constructor for class view.ElevatorView
    Constructs an ElevatorView.
    EMPTY - Enum constant in enum class model.TileTypes
     
    EmptyTile - Class in model
    Represents an empty, non-solid tile in the game world.
    EmptyTile(int, int) - Constructor for class model.EmptyTile
    Constructs an EmptyTile at the specified coordinates.
    endGame(boolean, long, long, long) - Method in class model.UserProfile
    Called at the end of a game to update the user's statistics and XP.
    Enemy - Class in model
    An abstract base class for all enemy entities in the game.
    Enemy(int, int, int, int, EnemyType) - Constructor for class model.Enemy
    Constructs a new Enemy.
    EnemyAnimationSet - Class in view
    A data container that holds pre-sliced animation frames for a specific type of enemy.
    EnemyAnimationSet(BufferedImage, BufferedImage, BufferedImage) - Constructor for class view.EnemyAnimationSet
    Constructs an EnemyAnimationSet by loading and slicing the provided sprite atlases.
    EnemyBehavior - Interface in model
    Defines the contract for an enemy's behavior strategy.
    EnemyFactory - Class in model
    A factory class for creating different types of enemies.
    EnemyFactory() - Constructor for class model.EnemyFactory
     
    EnemyState - Enum Class in model
    Enumerates the possible states for an enemy's state machine.
    EnemyStateHandler - Interface in model
    Defines the contract for a specific state in an enemy's state machine.
    enemyType - Variable in class model.Enemy
     
    EnemyType - Enum Class in model
    Enumerates the different types of enemies in the game.
    EnemyView - Class in view
    Renders an enemy entity on the screen.
    EnemyView() - Constructor for class view.EnemyView
     
    enter(Enemy) - Method in class model.AttackingState
    Called when the enemy enters the Attacking state.
    enter(Enemy) - Method in interface model.EnemyStateHandler
    Called once when the enemy enters this state.
    enter(Enemy) - Method in class model.IdleState
     
    enter(Enemy) - Method in class model.MovingState
     
    enter(Enemy) - Method in class model.TurningState
     
    enterRoom(int) - Method in class model.GameModel
    Transitions the player from the elevator into a specific room (level).
    Entity - Class in model
    An abstract base class for all dynamic game objects, such as the player and enemies.
    Entity(Point) - Constructor for class model.Entity
    Constructs an Entity at a given initial spawn point.
    equals(Object) - Method in class model.UserProfile
     
    exit(Enemy) - Method in class model.AttackingState
    Called when the enemy exits the Attacking state.

    exit(Enemy) - Method in class model.TurningState
     
    exitRoom(Directions) - Method in class model.GameModel
